TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit VerificationAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class VerificationAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class VerificationAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定义 Web 内容可访问性规则的元数据特性。

span.span: Defines the metadata attribute of a Web content accessibility rule.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例类定义可以验证 Web 内容可访问性规则。An instance of the class defines a Web content accessibility rule that can be verified. Web 内容的辅助功能准则的详细信息，请参阅[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on Web Content Accessibility Guidelines, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 定义的实例所需的信息的最少工作量包括：The minimal amount of information required to define an instance of a includes: - 验证规则表示的准则。A guideline that the verification rule represents. 构造函数中指定的值属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 准则的检查点。A checkpoint of the guideline. 构造函数中指定的值属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 检查点优先级。A checkpoint priority. 构造函数中指定的值属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - A所属枚举值，该值表示应为规则的报告级别。A enumeration value that represents the reporting level that should be rule belongs to. 构造函数中指定的值属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 验证规则为 true 时，将报告消息。A message that is reported when the verification rule is true. 构造函数中指定的值属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. 可以创建的实例时指定的验证规则的可选属性：Optional properties of the verification rule that can be specified when creating an instance: - A枚举值，该值表示应如何解释验证规则。A enumeration value that represents how the verification rule should be interpreted. 构造函数中指定的值属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - A枚举值，该值表示用于测试验证规则的条件表达式中的运算符。A enumeration value that represents the operator in the conditional expression used to test the verification rule. 构造函数中指定的值属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 可访问性引用准则 URL。An accessibility reference guideline URL. 构造函数中指定的值属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 表示条件表达式的右侧的条件值。A conditional value representing the right side of a conditional expression. 构造函数中指定的值属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 一个表示条件表达式左侧的条件属性。A conditional property representing the left side of a conditional expression. 构造函数中指定的值属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. 元数据可以是定义的类、 属性和索引器声明。The metadata can be defined class, property, and indexer declarations. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类。The following code example demonstrates using the class. 在验证元数据定义中，所采用的原则是"WCAG，"Web 内容可访问性准则和"ADA，"美国与残障人士 Act 指南。In the verification metadata definition, the guidelines used are "WCAG," the Web Content Accessibility Guideline, and "ADA," Americans with Disabilities Act Guidelines. 有关详细信息，请参阅[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 使用检查点分别，是"1.1"和"1194.22(a)"WCAG 和 ADA，确保对于非文本元素的文本等效存在的检查点。The checkpoints used are "1.1" and "1194.22(a)" for WCAG and ADA, respectively, checkpoints for ensuring that a text equivalent exists for non-text elements. 应用于`ImageText`表示另一个属性的文本等效项的属性称为`ImageProperty`。The is applied to the `ImageText` property that represents the text equivalent of another property called `ImageProperty`. 如果`ImageText`未设置属性，可访问性验证会返回消息"映像缺少等效文本。"If the `ImageText` property is not set, the accessibility verification will return the message "The image is missing a text equivalent." [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute/cs/VerificationAttributeExample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute/vb/VerificationAttributeExample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数的类指定定义验证规则所需的信息的最少工作量。The constructor of the class specifies the minimal amount of information needed to define a verification rule. 下列默认值为假定实例：The following default values for the instance are assumed: - 属性被设置为。The property is set as . - 属性被设置为。The property is set as . - 属性被设置为一个空字符串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). - 属性被设置为一个空字符串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). - 属性被设置为一个空字符串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). - 若要在其默认值超出上面的列表中指定属性的值，使用或构造函数重载。To specify values of the properties in the preceding list beyond their default values, use the or constructor overloads.

summary.span: 使用可访问性准则、检查点、报告级别、检查点优先级、错误信息、 值和相关条件属性初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with accessibility guideline, checkpoint, reporting level, checkpoint priority, error message, .value, and related conditional property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `conditionalProperty`参数是另一个属性，它使用的条件表达式的一部分来评估验证规则。The `conditionalProperty` parameter is another property that is used as part of the conditional expression to evaluate the verification rule. 例如，如果规则参数然后指定的相关的属性`conditionalProperty`必须不能为空字符串 ("")。For example, if the rule parameter is then the related property specified by `conditionalProperty` must not be an empty string (""). 下列默认值为假定实例：The following default values for the instance are assumed: - 属性被设置为。The property is set as . - 属性被设置为一个空字符串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). - 属性被设置为一个空字符串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). 若要在其默认值超出上面的列表中指定属性的值，使用构造函数重载。To specify values of the properties in the preceding list beyond their default values, use the constructor overload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这允许你创建的实例与指定的所有可能的属性的类。This allows you to create an instance of the class with all the possible properties specified.

Public ReadOnly Property Checkpoint As String
public: property System::String ^ Checkpoint { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取指定的 属性中的可访问性检查点引用。

span.span: Gets the accessibility checkpoint reference in the specified property.

value.span: 表示检查点引用的字符串。

span.span: A string representing the checkpoint reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时设置属性实例创建和是必需的。The property is set when the instance is created and is required. 上定义的 Web 内容辅助功能准则[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)准线数字后, 跟句号 （.） 后, 跟一个检查点数字的形式指定属性。For the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines defined on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125) the property is specified as a guideline number followed by a period (.) followed by a checkpoint number.

MemberSignature.Value: public string ConditionalProperty { get; }
.property instance string ConditionalProperty
Public ReadOnly Property ConditionalProperty As String
public: property System::String ^ ConditionalProperty { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用作验证可访问性检查点的一部分的条件表达式的左侧。

span.span: Gets the left side of a conditional expression used as part of the verification accessibility checkpoint.
The left side of the conditional expression.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性时可以设置实例创建，但是可选的。The property can be set when the instance is created, but is optional. 如果使用构造函数不采用`conditionalProperty`参数，默认值的空字符串 ("") 使用。If you use a constructor that does not take a `conditionalProperty` parameter, the default value of an empty string ("") is used. 属性为右侧或在可访问性检查点的验证中使用的条件表达式的值。The property is the right side, or value, of a conditional expression that is use in the verification of the accessibility checkpoint. 使用指定的条件表达式的左侧。The left side of the conditional expression is specified with the .

public: property System::String ^ ConditionalValue { System::String ^ get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性时可以设置实例创建，但是可选的。The property can be set when the instance is created, but is optional. 如果使用构造函数不采用`conditionalValue`参数，默认值的空字符串 ("") 使用。If you use a constructor that does not take a `conditionalValue` parameter, the default value of an empty string ("") is used. 属性为右侧或在可访问性检查点的验证中使用的条件表达式的值。The property is the right side, or value, of a conditional expression that is use in the verification of the accessibility checkpoint. 使用指定的条件表达式的左侧。The left side of the conditional expression is specified with the .

Public ReadOnly Property Guideline As String
public: property System::String ^ Guideline { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用于可访问性检查的准则。

span.span: Gets the guideline that used for accessibility checking.
A string representing the guideline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时设置属性实例创建和是必需的。The property is set when the instance is created and is required. 准则的示例包括"WCAG 1.1"和"ADA508"。Examples of guidelines include "WCAG 1.1" and "ADA508".

MemberSignature.Value: public string GuidelineUrl { get; }
.property instance string GuidelineUrl
Public ReadOnly Property GuidelineUrl As String
public: property System::String ^ GuidelineUrl { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 URL，该 URL 可用于获取有关 属性中给定的可访问性准则的更多信息。

span.span: Gets the URL the can be used to get more information on the accessibility guidelines given in the property.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性时可以设置实例创建，但是可选的。The property can be set when the instance is created, but is optional. 如果使用构造函数不采用`guidelineUrl`参数，默认值的空字符串 ("") 使用。If you use a constructor that does not take a `guidelineUrl` parameter, the default value of an empty string ("") is used. 输入的字符串属性不会检查是否正确。The string entered for the property is not checked for correctness.

An error string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时设置属性实例创建和是必需的。The property is set when the instance is created and is required.

summary.span: 获取可访问性检查点的优先级。

span.span: Gets the priority of the accessibility checkpoint.
An integer representing the priority.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义可访问性的属性的影响。The property defines the property's impact on accessibility. 同时和时设置属性实例创建和是必需的。Both the and property are set when the instance is created and is required.

summary.span: 获取一个 枚举值，该值指示可访问性检查点的验证方式。

span.span: Gets a enumeration value indication how the accessibility checkpoint is verified.
One of the enumeration values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性时可以设置实例创建，但是可选的。The property can be set when the instance is created, but is optional. 如果使用构造函数不采用`conditionalOperator`参数，默认值的使用。If you use a constructor that does not take a `conditionalOperator` parameter, the default value of is used.

One of the enumeration values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性时可以设置实例创建，但是可选的。The property can be set when the instance is created, but is optional. 如果使用构造函数不采用`rule`参数，默认值的使用。If you use a constructor that does not take a `rule` parameter, the default value of is used.
